info.name: Pass Wisely
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0. All card icons are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/hand-drawn-abstract-doodle-background_23870177.htm
info.description: Play melds or pass to gain rewards, but do so at your own risk!

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

gameStartRoutine.note: Set each player's point total to 0

loopRoutine.note: Deal each player a hand of cards
Deal each player a hand of cards
Deal each player a hand of cards
Deal each player a hand of cards
Deal each player a hand of cards

fields.text: You're about to start a new round. Are you sure?

label-guide-players.text:
Deck:			Hand:
2p:		3 suits (0-12)	16 cards (7 undealt)
3p:		3 suits (0-15)	16 cards
4p:		4 suits (0-15)	16 cards
5p:		4 suits (0-17)	14 cards (3 undealt)
6p:		4 suits (0-17)	12 cards

label-guide-melds.text:
Valid Melds:			Example:
* Singles (3p-6p)		3
* Sets				5, 5, 5, 5
* Suited Runs		7, 8
* Suited Gaps		7, 9, 11
